remarks: The properties of a division ring.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
drngi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
drngi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
drngi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
drngi.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
drngoi $p |- ( R e. DivRingOps -> ( R e. RingOps /\ ( H |` ( ( X \ { Z } ) X. ( X \ { Z } ) ) ) e. GrpOp ) ) $.
